#1.struct PartitionLogManager

```rust
// log manager for partition
// every partition has independent lsn value and log buffer
pub struct PartitionLogManager {
    // Partition info
    graph_id: GraphId,
    partition_id: PartitionId,

    // LSN generated by this partition for each append log operation
    current_lsn: AtomicU64,

    // Used to store LogEntries by user
    // and flushed to raft by log writer
    log_buffer: AtomicPtr<LogBuffer>,

    // Log writer task handle
    // if piepline feature implemented, will add more task handles
    log_task_handles: Vec<JoinHandle<()>>,
}
```
